thread.title_full: Top cop who accused Madeleine McCann’s parents of covering up her death is planning to write ANOTHER book after winning libel appeal

author: gmullin
title: Top cop who accused Madeleine McCann’s parents of covering up her death is planning to write ANOTHER book after winning libel appeal
text:
Opinion FRESH MISERY FOR MCCANNS Top cop who accused Madeleine McCann’s parents of covering up her death is planning to write ANOTHER book after winning libel appeal 
Goncalo Amaral is reportedly looking for a British publisher while finishing off the closing chapters of his second novel about the girl's disappearance By GEMMA MULLIN
